Package org.accada.epcis.queryclient

Interface Summary
QueryCallbackInterface  
QueryControlInterface  
 

Class Summary
Query Implements an example query object for the EPCIS Query Interface Client.
QueryCallbackClient  
QueryClientGui Implements the GUI part of the EPCIS Query Interface client.
QueryClientGuiHelper Implements a Class to interface with the EPCIS query client.
QueryControlClient This query client makes calls against the EPCIS query control interface and also provides some convenience methods for polling and subscribing queries given in XML form.
 

Enum Summary
QueryClientGui.ParameterType The enumaration of all possible Types a Queryparameter can have.
